description: Detects a command used by conti to dump database Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Conti Backup Database
query: (process.command_line:(*sqlcmd\ * OR *sqlcmd.exe*) AND process.command_line:*\ \-S\ localhost\ * AND process.command_line:(*sys.sysprocesses* OR *master.dbo.sysdatabases* OR *BACKUP\ DATABASE*))
